General.Name: Ningbo Bohui Chemical Technology
General.Description: Ningbo Bohui Chemical Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of special oil products in China. It offers heavy aromatics, light fuel oil, and environmentally friendly aromatic oil. The company also engages in the wholesale and retail of aromatics, lubricating oil, and other petroleum products; sales of chemical products, petroleum products, bio-based materials, food additives, etc.; leasing of non-residential real estate; import and export of goods; and provision of technical development, consultation, and promotion services. It also offers storage equipment leasing services; and bio-based materials. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Bohui Petrochemical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Bohui Chemical Technology Co.,Ltd in March 2014. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Ningbo, China. Ningbo Bohui Chemical Technology Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of s Ningbo Wenkui Holding Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Ningbo Petrochemical Economic and Technological Development Zone, Ningbo, China, 315207
